item.title: ‘The memories still exist’: Amber Ugarte on the loss of her Malibu home, built by her late fiancé, and why she’s not even close to giving up
item.description: “The memories still exist,” Ugarte says, “but the property does not.”

item.title: My wife, 72, and I, 80, have two houses and 56 acres of land. Our daughter is a joint tenant on our real estate. Do we need a will?
item.description: This couple has done a lot to clear the path ahead — but they have made one big mistake.

item.title: How to ‘Trump-proof’ your 401(k)
item.description: An investment idea for the terrified.

item.title: 13 dividend stocks selected for value at a time when the S&P 500 trades sky high
item.description: The S&P 500 is expensive by most broad measures, but a deeper look tells a different story and presents an opportunity for long-term investors.
